title: Cloud Analyst
description:
CloudCore Consulting is Hiring a Cloud Analyst (Full-Time)

CloudCore Consulting, a Stockholm-based firm, supports cloud solutions for clients in tech and finance. We’re seeking a Cloud Analyst to analyze and implement cloud strategies.

Role Summary
You’ll support cloud implementations to optimize client operations.

Key Tasks
- Analyze cloud requirements.
- Support cloud implementations.
- Collaborate for system integration.
- Provide technical support.
- Optimize cloud performance.
- Conduct system audits.
- Stay updated on cloud trends.
- Prepare client reports.
- Support client training.
- Share team insights.

Qualifications
We need candidates with 2–3 years of experience in cloud solutions, with knowledge of SAP or other cloud platforms. Strong analytical and client-facing skills are essential. A Bachelor’s degree in IT or a related field is required.

Why CloudCore?
We value innovation and collaboration. Our hybrid work model and training support growth in a dynamic environment.

Perks
Health insurance
Pension
25 days of annual leave
Training budget
Cloud tools access
Team events

Apply Now
Join CloudCore Consulting to drive cloud solutions. Submit your application today!

#CloudCoreCareers #CloudSolutions #HiringNow
